revisions.rev:
This is a '''list of [[regnant]] and [[pretender|non-regnant]] princely, royal and imperial houses''' of the world. The names of reigning monarchs are in bold text. Names used if the individual were reigning are given if known, otherwise the name given is the name currently used for them. == Africa == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" |-
